data_table.description: This subject consent file includes subject IDs, consent group information, and subject aliases from the three centers (UCSD, UPenn, USC) participating in the Single Cell Analysis Program - Transcriptome (SCAP-T).

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository
